ygData.subject: Re: Charm
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s been like that for ages. Months ago I noticed this when using Lullaby on lizards in Cazic. Justicators got heals off, wraths off, ever kind of spell,
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 18/99, kim@... wrote:
>
> Funny you should mention that. I think the same bug is
> affecting Lullaby. Lullaby does not have a knockback
> component so the "stun" effect is the only way it can
> interrupt spells. I've seen a handful of cases the last week
> where spellcasting mobs nodded, but successfully completed
> their spells.

It's been like that for ages. Months ago I noticed this when using
Lullaby on lizards in Cazic. Justicators got heals off, wraths off,
ever kind of spell, dispite supposedly being asleep.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
